[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/9df7pcyam9s.jpg” background_blend=”color” custom_padding=”40px||65px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” locked=”off”][et_pb_row custom_margin=”|||” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto|on||on|” text_font_size=”24px” text_letter_spacing=”4px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%”]Exclusive Offer[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

KENNEDY SPACE CAMP
7 DAYS/ 6 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”31px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|26px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_margin=”-19px|auto||auto||” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” custom_margin=”|175px||175px||true” admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ORLANDO

Arrive in Orlando International Airport and transfer to Dinner in at Local/Indian Restaurant and later transfer to hotel.

Stay at overnight.

 

DAY 02: UNIVERSAL STUDIOS

After breakfast, this morning we depart for Universal Studios Orlando. Universal is home to brand new Harry Potter adventure land. The park is owned by NBC studios and will give you an insight to how movies are made in Hollywood. At Universal Studios you will see rides themed around movies you have watched at home such as: Shrek, Terminator, Simpson’s and much more. Either Cash Allowance for lunch or Meal voucher will be provided. After a fun filled day we will proceed to dinner at the restaurant and back to the hotel.

 

DAY 03: SPACE CAMP

After an early breakfast checkout of hotel and proceed to Kennedy Space Center. Kennedy Space Center is the only active launch pad in North America. After you are met and introduced to your educators proceed for a full day of activities. Lunch will be provided at the camp. We then proceed for the hotel for some leisure time. You will have some leisure time to enjoy.  Later in the evening dinner at the restaurant and stay overnight.

Optional Add on Tour:

ICON Orlando TM – A Ride of Iconic Proportions: At 400 feet tall—the largest observation wheel on the East Coast of the United States—ICON Orlando TM truly earns its name. Towering on the horizon and visible from miles away, ICON Orlando TM offers guests the ability to see downtown, the theme parks and the Central Florida landscape like never before. ICON Orlando TM is a new ride every time—from day to night, its colors always changing—but it always makes for a moment to remember. It is the perfect way to elevate an amazing moment. Find your Iconic Moment. Later enjoy the dinner at one of the best Restaurant in Orlando

SUHLS RODEO – Suhls Rodeo is an exciting show called “THE GREATEST SHOW ON DIRT” that will deliver a unique experience of heart pounding, foot stomping action. It does not matter if you like Bull Riding, Barrel Racing, or Bronc Riding, Suhls Rodeo has something for everyone.  We have family friendly fun!  Calf scramble for kids 10 and under, audience participation and great action!

 

DAY 04: SPACE CAMP

Following breakfast this morning we depart for Kennedy Space Center; you will get the opportunity to meet an astronaut today with sometime for question and answer session. Lunch today will be provided by the camp and then later proceed back to the hotel. Enjoy some leisure time today followed by a dinner at the Restaurant & Stay Overnight.

Optional Add on Tours: This day group can do one of the below Attractions.

SKELETONS: Museum of Osteology™ The newest science museum and only natural history museum in Orlando. Come join in on the excitement and appreciation for the natural world by exploring a collection of over 500 REAL skeletons.

7D Dark Ride – Adventure Gather your courage for an interactive first-person shooter that puts you into the game. This state-of-the-art shooting game has seven dimensions all while playing a 3D video.

Arcade City – An exciting destination that will bring out the competitive spirit of the whole family. Win prizes and set records in one of the best arcades in Orlando. Pearl Express Train The whole family can hop on for a delightful train ride.

 

DAY 05: SPACE CAMP

Check out of hotel this morning following breakfast and proceed to Kennedy Space Center. You did it! You have taken your first step forward to becoming an astronaut. After your lunch and Graduation ceremony rest of time at leisure. Later in the evening dinner at the restaurant and stay overnight.

Optional Add on Tours: This day group can do one of the below Attractions.

SEA LIFE Orlando Aquarium – Prepare for a world of glittering scales and razor-sharp teeth. Plunge deep into the ocean exploring Florida’s only 360-degree ocean tunnel with our friendly sea turtles -Only at SEA LIFE Orlando!

Madame Tussauds Orlando – Hit the stage with Taylor Swift, score a GOOAALL with Neymar, and save the world with Wonder Woman™, Superman™ and Batman™! Dazzle your friends with the #BestSelfieEver – only at Madame Tussauds!

WonderWorks Orlando – Where Physical Science Meets Physical Fitness

Push! Pull! Climb! Feel! Live the experience! Featuring over 100 hands-on exhibits, WonderWorks is fun for all ages! Design and ride your own roller-coaster, encapsulate yourself in a bubble, lie on a bed of nails, analyze fingerprint ridge patterns, climb the multi-level indoor ropes course, and feel hurricane force winds in your hair!

WonderWorks provides a unique setting for students K-12 to learn about physical sciences:

Earth Science – Explore Earth’s natural disasters and live to tell the story.

Physics – Experience energy, gravity, and light.

Astronomy – Leave Earth behind and blast off into the stars.

 

DAY 06: MAGIC KINGDOM DISNEY

We start the day at leisure today. After breakfast, this morning we will proceed to Magic Kingdom. Magic   Kingdom sees nearly 20 million visitors a year; this makes it the most visited park in the world. It was the 1st park opened in Disney world around 40 years ago; today it still holds some of the world’s most thrilling rides. You will have the day to explore Magic Kingdom at your leisure. Packed lunch or voucher will be provided. In the evening after the Fireworks show we proceed to dinner at the restaurant and then back to hotel.

 

DAY 07: FLY BACK TO HOME

Our journey comes to an end today. Depart for home with memories that are sure to last a lifetime.
